title: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
EB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results for declarations. However, currently, no results are being displayed. Search via the context menu in the packages view is working correctly. Additionally, the search functionality should first attempt to retrieve the Java element and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view selection and dialog.
2. Perform a search for declarations.
3. Observe that no results are being displayed.

NOTE: Search via the context menu in the packages view is functioning correctly. The search functionality should first try to retrieve the Java element and if it fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
